评论详情: They fit small! Strong compression. Material is nice. I love the pink! Not see through

评论概述: Who Doesn’t Love a Pair of Yoga Pants?!?
评论详情: I purchased these pants during a flash sale & now I’m sold. The size I purchased is perfect, the fabric is stretchy but comfy, & quality seems to be holding up. I will be buying more soon!

评论概述: Great fit and feel, but side seams tend to get ragged after washing.
评论详情: I wear these daily, to work out in and to WFH. They are smoothing and are nice and cool, some yoga pants can be hot, but this material is very breathable. They hit three inches below my knee and I'm 5'6. I get the large size and I'm curvy at 160, the crotch area does seem to go south after a few hours, but easily can be pulled up. My only complaint is the side seams tend to get ragged with washing, I'm not brushing up against anything, so I don't know what causes this wear other than normal washing. I wish they made the seams a bit more durable for the long term, however, at this price...they are a winner.

评论概述: Fit great, feel great, excellent quality and price
评论详情: I’m 5’2” and weigh 190 lbs.  I work out with weights and do aerobics and need exercise pants that are comfortable and fit well. These size XL are perfect. The fabric is smooth and could be worn under a dress without clinging. I’m happy I bought these and would buy them again

I have 4 pairs of the black leggings I bought just a couple of years ago.  I love them. Very soft, not see through, the elastic is nice and stretchy. I wanted another pair and chose blue.  In the past with other Amazon brand clothing items I've noticed inconsistency in the products.  I have shirts I ordered from the same listing same time and they are all different sizes and fits. I was really hoping these pants would be the same as the black and quality hadn't changed.  Unfortunately they changed.  The blue pair I received has much thinner material.  It's less stretchy.  I compared waistband sizes and the blue are about 2 inches smaller than the black.  The elastic in the blue feels awful.  It feels cheap and it doesn't stretch at all.  They had a good thing going with these and like all things Amazon they had to change it up for worse quality items.  Won't be buying again

These leggings fit nice. I sized down from my normal size (s) to an xs small for my own personal preference. I will say the xs fit me very well & they don’t fall down, which is why I chose to size down. I have wider hips but a small waist, if that helps.
Comfortable fit. Easy to move around in.

Ordered this and it fit really well…noticed a small less than a month after I bought it and now there’s a hole in the seam at the butt area and I can’t return it bc it’s 2 days past the return date!!  Don’t waste your money!

评论概述: Holes after less than three months.
评论详情: I bought these in May for working out so I wear & wash them 3-4 times a week. Mid July I noticed the first hole in the inner thigh seam. I know I probably wear & wash these more than the average but they should still last longer than 2 & a half months.

Great compression around the stomach, however there's no compression in the legs. It almost feels like they sag due to the fit. They do not sag, they gut great. I don't love the feel of them. I would love them more if there was some compression in the legs that match the tummy area. All in all, I'm happy with my purchase. I like the feel of the fabric, I probably would not purchase again.

I have bought and returned and kept unhappily about 10 pairs of various brands of capris to try to get ready for a trip. Finally, I have found the brand that checks ALL the boxes. If you like under armor or kohls tek gear brand these are the capris for you. The material is nice size is accurate. Tighter on the calf hug but not tight. They are thick enough but not too thick. Very happy with these and ordering another pair. Price is a little higher than others listed but not too high and worth the extra for myself.

I initially ordered the pink color but had to return because you could see my cellulite. I reordered the black, and they’re perfect! So I ordered the navy too. Beware of the lighter colors, they show your cellulite but the dark colors are fine. Fabric is otherwise buttery soft & of good quality. I’m 5’3”, 190-200 & the XL fit me great.

I was very hesitant in ordering plus size capris . When I order them they usually come either too big or too small, but not these . These are such great quality . The fit is great and they are the most comfortable Thing that I own . The hot pink color is beautiful and you can tell they are really well made . I normally wear a 4X in capris but after reading the reviews I ordered a size up (5X) they are roomy and are a little big but I’m glad that they are. I’m going to Order every color . These are the only capris I will ever wear again!! 🩷🩷
There are my favorite! I ordered a second pair.

评论概述: Not a good fit for thick thighs
评论详情: I will be returning these, they don’t fit my body properly. The cut is very square shaped so if you have large thighs or booty and a proportionally smaller waist they won’t fit. These are very tight around the thighs and almost loose at the waist, so they are always trying to fall down and are just not comfortable. The material also doesn’t feel nice, I ordered three different pairs of leggings from three companies and these are my least favorite
The fit was great. The fabric is excellent as it isn't thin or see-through. I will definitely buy more.

I ordered these based on the fabric content, because it is the same as a pair of my favorite leggings from Old Navy that are super old. These are true-to-size and comfortable, but I got them to wear for aerial silks and the material is just too shiny and slippery to work for that, so I'm returning them. If they were just for regular wear or any other kind of workout I'd 100% recommend them.
Very comfortable and on point with sizing, the torso is just a tad too long for us height challenged chicks lol.

评论概述: So soft and awesomely stretchy but still holds things in 🙌
评论详情: After 2 babies I need some strong stretchy leggings and I haven't worn these for long but so far these seem to be pretty amazing! When I first opened the package I thought oh no they're way too small, but out of curiosity I wanted to see if I could even get them on. They fit like a tight glove. Typically for something to fit this well in the hips it's too loose in the waist but these are staying up and keeping the mom belly in! I wouldn't be comfortable wearing them with a shorter tshirt but it's perfect for longer shirts and under my little bo peep costume lol

I wear these to workout, mostly cycling and cardio. I find the pants fit true to size and look just like they do online. I am 5’5”, 155 and wear a 8 or 10 in pants.
